illustration_style.type: 3D rendered | flat illustration | photorealistic | abstract | none
illustration_style.material: soft plastic, glass reflections | matte | metallic | organic
illustration_style.shadow_style: soft ambient occlusion | hard shadows | no shadows

style_context.consistency_notes: All illustrations should feel like they belong to the same family — same lighting direction, same shadow softness, same level of detail, same color temperature

context.purpose: Primary visual impact, sets tone for entire site

text_overlay.safe_zone: Keep main visual interest in right 60% of frame

subject.description: Abstract data visualization — flowing streams of light representing data movement

style_requirements.render_style: Cinematic, photorealistic lighting on abstract forms
style_requirements.lighting: Dramatic rim lighting, volumetric light rays, subtle lens flare acceptable
style_requirements.colors: Primary blue (#0066FF) and accent green (#00D4AA) as light sources against dark background
style_requirements.depth: Strong sense of depth — foreground bokeh elements, mid-ground focus, background fade
style_requirements.motion_feel: Should feel dynamic, like captured mid-motion

avoid: Recognizable UI elements or device screens
Readable text, numbers, or binary code
Circuit board patterns or cliché tech imagery

context.usage: Will be displayed on both light and dark backgrounds

subject.description: Bar chart with upward trend arrow

transparency.background_spec: Generate on solid white (#FFFFFF) for easy background removal
transparency.isolation_notes: Object must be completely isolated, no shadows or reflections extending beyond object boundary
transparency.edge_quality: Clean, crisp, anti-aliased edges suitable for compositing on any background color

style_requirements.render_style: 3D rendered, soft plastic/glass material with subtle reflections
style_requirements.lighting: Soft studio lighting from top-left at 45-degree angle, subtle ambient occlusion
style_requirements.colors: Primary blue (#0066FF) for bars, accent green (#00D4AA) for trend arrow
style_requirements.detail_level: Medium detail, clean smooth geometry, subtle surface gradients
style_requirements.composition: Centered in frame, object fills approximately 80% with equal padding

avoid: Text, labels, or numbers on the chart
Gradients that won't work on dark backgrounds

context.purpose: Friendly visual to soften empty state, encourage action
context.usage: Centered in content area, likely on light background

subject.description: Friendly illustration of an empty box or container with a subtle sparkle suggesting potential

transparency.isolation_notes: Illustration should be self-contained with soft edges
transparency.edge_quality: Can have soft/faded edges for gentle integration

style_requirements.lighting: Soft, even lighting with gentle shadows
style_requirements.colors: Muted version of primary blue, with accent as sparkle color
style_requirements.composition: Centered, with breathing room around edges

background_removal.description: Remove solid background to create transparency
background_removal.when: For all images with transparency.required = true
verify: Works on both light and dark backgrounds

edge_cleanup.description: Clean up any artifacts at image edges after background removal
edge_cleanup.when: After background_removal if edges are not clean

color_adjustment_to_match_tokens.description: Adjust generated colors to exactly match design tokens
color_adjustment_to_match_tokens.when: If generated colors drift from specified hex values
color_adjustment_to_match_tokens.method: Color mapping in Sharp or manual adjustment
